about.description:
LibNFS is a client library that implements the Network File System (NFS)
protocol, allowing applications to access files on remote NFS servers.
The library provides a complete NFS client implementation with support for
NFSv3 and NFSv4 protocols, as well as related protocols such as MOUNT,
PORTMAP, NLM (Network Lock Manager), NSM (Network Status Monitor), and
RQUOTA.
about.summary: LIBNFS is a client library for accessing NFS shares over a network.

name: libnfs

about.description:
LibNFS is a client library that implements the Network File System (NFS)
protocol, allowing applications to access files on remote NFS servers.
The library provides a complete NFS client implementation with support for
NFSv3 and NFSv4 protocols, as well as related protocols such as MOUNT,
PORTMAP, NLM (Network Lock Manager), NSM (Network Status Monitor), and
RQUOTA.
about.summary: LIBNFS is a client library for accessing NFS shares over a network.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "libnfs" %}
{% set version = "6.0.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/sahlberg/libnfs/archive/refs/tags/libnfs-{{ version }}.tar.gz  
  sha256: 4e5459cc3e0242447879004e9ad28286d4d27daa42cbdcde423248fad911e747

build:
  skip: true  # [win]    
  number: 0

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ stdlib('c') }}
    - cmake
    - make

test:
  commands:
      - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libnfs${SHLIB_EXT}
      - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/nfsc/libnfs.h
      - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/nfsc/libnfs-raw.h
      - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/nfsc/libnfs-raw-mount.h
      - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/nfsc/libnfs-raw-nfs.h
      - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/nfsc/libnfs-raw-nfs4.h
      - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/nfsc/libnfs-raw-nlm.h
      - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/nfsc/libnfs-raw-nsm.h
      - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/nfsc/libnfs-raw-portmap.h
      - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/nfsc/libnfs-raw-rquota.h
      - test -f ${PREFIX}/include/nfsc/libnfs-zdr.h
about:
  home: https://github.com/sahlberg/libnfs
  summary: 'LIBNFS is a client library for accessing NFS shares over a network.'
  description: |
    LibNFS is a client library that implements the Network File System (NFS) 
    protocol, allowing applications to access files on remote NFS servers. 
    The library provides a complete NFS client implementation with support for
    NFSv3 and NFSv4 protocols, as well as related protocols such as MOUNT, 
    PORTMAP, NLM (Network Lock Manager), NSM (Network Status Monitor), and 
    RQUOTA. 

  license: LGPL-2.1-or-later
  license_file:
    - COPYING  # Clarifies what license is used for what.
    - LICENCE-LGPL-2.1.txt  # For the library itself
    - LICENCE-BSD.txt  # For the raw header files that are generated from the .x files
    - LICENCE-GPL-3.txt  # For the utilities and examples (not included in this conda package)
  doc_url: https://deepwiki.com/sahlberg/libnfs
  dev_url: https://github.com/sahlberg/libnfs

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - rhpvorderman
